title: The Occupation Certificate for buildings constructed out of last 25% of admissible FSI for residential/commercial use shall be granted by the Commissioner only after recreational area is developed and structure for recreational activities are actually provided on site
clause_text: The Occupation Certificate for buildings constructed out of last 25% of admissible FSI for residential/commercial use shall be granted by the Commissioner only after recreational area is developed and structure for recreational activities are actually provided on site. Provided further that in case of layout having 2 or more buildings, development of proportionate recreational area may be permitted subject to completion of entire recreational area & structure thereon for recreational activities prior to seeking occupation of last buildings.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
